publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesStmt.note: Vocalized as necessary; title (שער השמות) appears mid-line, in enlarged squared characters above a space; Contains last words of chapter on verbs (שער הפעלים) and the beginning of the chapter on proper nouns (שער השמות); Parallel, in the published edition (Fürth 1793), to p. 151a l. 7 – p. 154a l. 17 חידתי שהטעם.
Condition: exterior half only; last two lines erased.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

msItem.title: Part of David Kimḥi's treatise on Hebrew grammar, Mikhlol
msItem.author: Kimhi, David, approximately 1160-approximately 1235 Ḳimḥi, Daṿid 1160-1235 קמחי, דוד בן יוסף, 1160-1235 Кимхи, Давид, 1160-1235 Kimḥi, David, ca 1160-ca 1235 Dawid ben Yosef ben Yiẕḥaq ibn Qimḥi (David ben Joseph), ca1160-ca1235 David Qimhi c. 1160-c. 1235 rabbi Kimhi, David, rabbi, c. 1160-c. 1235 Kimḥi, David דוד קמחי Kimhi, David ben Joseph 1160-1235 Qimḥi, David Kimchi, David ben Josef, asi 1160-asi 1235 David ben Joseph Kimhi, rabbi, c. 1160-c. 1235 David Qimhi, rabbi, c. 1160-c. 1235 Maistre Petit, rabbi, c. 1160-c. 1235 Redak, rabbi, c. 1160-c. 1235

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 28; ruling method: left rule justified by stretching last character.

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
